welcome_message_body: Welcome to Laguna Niguel, where the beautiful coastal views and laid-back atmosphere await you. Explore our charming city, known for its pristine beaches, hiking trails, and vibrant local culture. Enjoy your stay and all that Laguna Niguel has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access complimentary WiFi for up to 45 minutes after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, where all domestic and international flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
